name: 4th Impact
description: '''4th Impact''' is a [[Filipinos|Filipino]] girl group composed of sisters Almira, Irene, Mylene and Celina Cercado. The group competed in the [[The X Factor (British series 12)|twelfth season]] of the British singing contest ''[[The X Factor (British TV series)|The X Factor]]'', where they were the ninth contestant eliminated. They are also known for having participated in several Philippine and international talent competitions, including the ''World Championships of Performing Arts'', which they won in 2006 and 2013, and the South Korean talent search ''[[Superstar K6]]'' in 2014, where they reached eighth place. The sisters are originally from [[Roxas, Isabela]], and are now based in [[Metro Manila]].
